text: Hello mi amor, I can't stop thinking about last night ü•∞. I woke up still hard this morning üòÖ. I really want to get a hotel for us for the next meeting, so that we don't have to be silent and we can sleep a few hours together under the rain ü•∞. Do you have specific days off or days where you don't have to go to work early? If so, we can plan around that and match a day that I do not work early, so we can be up late together üòò
